TopicTitle: Remote Tech installed but won't work?!?!?!

Articles.Content:
Hi there

Not sure if this is the right place to put this but I have Remote Tech installed but it won't work as such!

I can't access any sort of "Target" Menu and the ships fly even without antenna!

Thanks

Jayden

In the tracking station, do you have extra buttons in the bottom left corner? (could be bottom right)

There should be a button with a satellite dish, one with like "V" kinda symbol, and a coupla others.

If they aren't present, then something probably went wrong with installation.

(Also, this should probably go in the RemoteTech thread in "Released Addons" )
